attributes.action: UK Parliament must pressure UN to investigate lethal force by Israel.
attributes.additional_details:
The internet,including Facebook,Twitter,Independent.   
British T V including R T , Euronews,FRANCE24,Al Jazeera.
attributes.background: Many people died on Monday when Israeli troops opened fire with British-made equipment , in the deadliest day of violence there since 2014, with over 2,700  injured. No country should sit back and watch the lethal force against unarmed Palestinians exercising their human right to demonstrate.

rejection.details:
The UN Human Rights Council has already decided to investigate. You can find out more here:

http://www.ohchr.org/EN/HRBodies/HRC/Pages/NewsDetail.aspx?NewsID=23108&LangID=E
